body.p: The Oxygen AI Positron for Content Fusion plugin can be installed on a Content Fusion server and it provides the ability to use a specific AI engine (OpenAI, Microsoft Azure OpenAI, or Claude) for chat purposes or to run useful predefined actions.
You can download the plugin from here: Oxygen AI Positron for Content Fusion Installation.
You can then install the plugin in the Content Fusion server to make the AI Positron side-pane accessible. For information about its features, see .

p.note: The AI Positron side-pane appears in the UI only if the plugin is configured by an administrator.

body.p: The connection details to the AI engine can be configured by following the steps below.

section.title: Configuring the Oxygen AI Positron for Content Fusion Plugin

ol.li: Go to the Web Author tab.

li.p: Click the Configure icon next to the Oxygen AI Positron for Content Fusion plugin to open the Plugin configuration dialog box.
In the AI Service tab, specify the connector and configure the necessary details.
